Bought from a shady guy at the Pokémon Center for 500 Poké Dollar.
Received from a girl in Cerulean City if the partner Pikachu's friendship is 147 or higher.
Yellow.shortcut: Use the potion glitch to raise Pikachu's friendship quickly. Simply use a potion (or other HP-restoring items) on Pikachu, even when it's at full health, repeatedly to increase its friendship level.

Yellow.notes: Received from a girl in Cerulean City if the partner Pikachu's friendship is 147 or higher. Use the potion glitch to raise Pikachu's friendship quickly. Simply use a potion (or other HP-restoring items) on Pikachu, even when it's at full health, repeatedly to increase its friendship level.
